channel.title: AWS on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Greg Herlein

item.title: Book Review: AWS Cookbook
item.description: Tl;dr: The AWS Cookbook is a must have addition to your reference library. Disclaimer: I received a free copy of this book from the author.

item.title: Enable Chatbots on the phone using Amazon Lex and the Amazon Chime SDK
item.description: Telephony made a huge leap forward last week. It’s insanely easy to build a voice chatbot for phone calls!

item.title: Creating an Ephemeral EC2 Instance for Development for Testing
item.description: “Cattle, not Pets!” they say. Except that for a lot of development, coders make their own laptop their favorite pet. “It works on my machine!” becomes normal. I got tired of that and automated the creation of my dev environment..

item.title: My First Amazon Blog... ML/AI Chatbot over the Phone!
item.description: A month ago I told you I changed roles at AWS. Now I can show you what I’ve done since then!

item.title: Back to the (Phone) Future! Changing roles!
item.description: The only constant is change! And… sometimes things come full circle. I’m changing roles at AWS. Back to the Future!

item.title: Progress on ESP32 and FreeRTOS
item.description: Progress, but not where I want it to be. But it builds and installs the FreeRTOS AWS IoT demo.

item.title: Back to Basics: AWS IoT C SDK
item.description: A few quick notes on getting the AWS IoT C SDK running on Linux.

item.title: Dabbling into ESP32 and FreeRTOS
item.description: Dipping a toe into the FreeRTOS ESP32 world.

item.title: Kinesis Video Streams - Just Getting Started
item.description: Just started playing with Amazon Kinesis Video Streams.

item.title: AWS SysOps Administrator Certified!
item.description: This week I passed the AWS SysOps Administrator (Associate) Exam. Here’s some notes on what I did to prepare, and observations of the process.

item.title: Changes - Ending 2020
item.description: As 2020 thankfully winds down, I leave Cisco and join AWS.

item.title: Using CloudWatch for On-Premise Ubuntu Servers
item.description: Can I replace a local Prometheus with AWS CloudWatch? And include syslog monitoring as well? Yes, I can. But it was a PITA to set up. Here’s how.

item.title: Terraform in AWS: use AMI Names not IDs - and is Terraform the right answer still?
item.description: In AWS the AMI ID for a particular VM image is unique to that region. But it’s name is consistent across AWS. When building infra-as-code (such as terraform) use the name, not the ID. And some musings on terraform. Is it still the right answer for infra-as-code?

item.title: Self Driving Revolution
item.description: Think self-driving technology requires deep pockets to play with? Think again. AWS DeepRacer and Autoware are the leading edges of self-driving automation for the maker.

item.title: AWS Certified
item.description: On Becoming an AWS Certified Solutions Architect (Associate)
